casebody.data:
The First National Bank of Lexington, Surviving Executor of the Estate of B. Estes Vaughan, Deceased, et als. v. Marion V. Gray, et als. November 11, 1937.

Present, Campbell, C. J., and Holt, Hudgins, Gregory, Eggleston and Spratley, JJ.

C. S. Glasgow, for the appellants. White & Temple, for the appellees.

Richmond
